history.proof: intros a. unfold is_gcd. split. - unfold is_cd. split; try reflexivity. + hauto l: on depth: 3. + srun best use: divides_refl. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a. unfold is_gcd. split. - unfold is_cd. split; try reflexivity. intro d'. intros [_ H]. specialize (H d'). auto. - intro d'. intros [H _]. apply H.
